column5: A kindergarten pupil says to his teacher that he saw a cat and it was dead.  The teacher asks," How do you know it was dead?"  "Because I pi.ssed in its ear and it didn't move", said the little boy innocently.  "You did WHAT?" said the teacher who was shocked by the comment.  The little boy said, " You know. I leaned over and went Pssst and it didn't move."
